updates.title: COVID-19
updates.message:
Due to COVID-19 pandemic restrictions, we are working again, but with limited services. You will notice that more spacing between appointments gives us the time to keep everyone safe. We are trying our best to fit everyone in for routine cleanings and exams.

That said, please call us right away if you have an urgent dental need before your next checkup. We are always ready for phone calls to 610-345-0267, emails to SCCFD08@gmail.com, and through this app's Virtual Forms.
